thread.title: Scarlett Johansson and Romain Dauriac 'split after two years of marriage'
thread.title_full: Scarlett Johansson and Romain Dauriac 'split after two years of marriage'

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: Scarlett Johansson and Romain Dauriac 'split after two years of marriage'
text:
Scarlett Johansson and Romain Dauriac 'split after two years of marriage' Scarlett Johansson with Romain Dauriac Credit: Getty 
S carlett Johansson and husband Romain Dauriac have reportedly ended their marriage after two years. 
The American actress, who was seen recently without her wedding ring, and her French husband separated last summer, a source told People magazine. 
“I’ve been expecting this for some time," a source associated with Mr Dauriac told the celebrity website. 
"Romain and Scarlett has never made sense to me. They aren’t equals. There’s always been something wrong with this picture.” 
Johansson, 32, was seen at the women's march in Washington without her wedding ring, People reported, and was photographed again without it on Wednesday in New York. Scarlett Johansson attends the Women's March on Washington Credit: Getty 
T he couple were last photographed together at the opening of their co-owned gourmet popcorn store in Paris called Yummy Pop . 
According to E! News at the time, the actress called the business venture "a dream of mine and my family for several years to bring our favorite American snack to our favorite European City!" 
Having begun dating in 2012, the couple got engaged a year later and married in October 2014 shortly after the birth of their daughter. Pay gap | Highest-earning actors vs actresses 
T hey split their time between New and Paris. "We're both street rats," she told Cosmpolitan last year. "Being a New Yorker is a part of your personality, and he grew up in the heart of Paris. Just surviving the urban jungle is character building. It stays with you forever." 
Johansson was previously married to Ryan Reynolds, who now has two children with his wife, the actress Blake Lively.
